1.13:
> This update synchronizes changes from Codeforces Better v1.68 - 1.74 to AtCoder Better

>



- Added button to jump to VJudge

- Added "beautify code blocks" feature to replace pre code blocks on the page with monaco editor, which will also improve code display in dark mode - Improved various request methods for Clist Rating to fix issues with not getting data correctly - Improved prompt for ChatGPT translations, and fixed a possible injection bug causing translations to be translated. This will also improve the display of code in dark mode

- Improved each request method of Clist Rating to solve the problem of not getting the data correctly

- Improved the prompt for ChatGPT translations, and fixed the problem of possible injection errors that could lead to incomplete translations

- Improved the code related to the LaTeX Replacement/Restore, which now correctly restores the code in the case of multi-nesting. restore

- Enhance robustness of website localization methods

- Adjust code related to Dark Mode to use variables for consistent style and management

- Replace CDN staticfile.org with staticfile.net

- Fix clist ratings for some questions on question list page that may show not found



- Fix anomaly in clist scores on question set pages

- Fix diff comparison style not aligned in code online test

- Fix deepl 429 not displaying message correctly after reporting error

- Fix clist rating may not be found on question page

- Fix Logu jump method error in old Tampermonkey



- Fix unexpected deadlock when MathJax library file is not loaded correctly. and an unexpected dead loop would occur causing the page to get stuck

- Fixed DeepL free mode translations not displaying the in-translation prompts correctly

- Fixed scripts that might not load correctly

- Fixed typos between adjacent LaTeX formulas that could be broken



- Some other tweaks and improvements



------



- Separated website localization data into external JSON for easier maintenance

- Scripts support internationalization while using the crowdin platform to automate localization efforts

- Replaced some buttons with icon buttons

- Added support for the DeepL API, including the official api-free, api-pro, and deeplx, thanks to @Vistarin for the suggestion

- Added support for deepl and chatgpt configuration balance queries. Note that this also requires your service provider to support and provide the corresponding API

- Add judgment on the text before translation, if it looks like a code snippet, it won't be translated automatically, and there will also be a popup window prompting before clicking translate

- Add the function of selecting the target language of the translation service

- Add the about page, as well as the option of updating the channel and the source of the update

- Add the page of debugging and maintenance, including cache refreshing, data clearing, and import and export

- Add customization options. Add customization optionsï¼š "'Code editor submit button position", default is the bottom, thanks to @lishufood's suggestion

- Improve each loading function, remove some unnecessary waiting relationships, speed up script loading time

- Improve the translation function related methods, and the way of displaying error messages

- Improve the performance of auto-translation, and the problem that may not be able to be automatically translation

- Improve code related to running code samples online

- Improve codeDiff() for comparing difference of running results

- Improve dialog window as background content no longer scrolls with mouse

- Improve code editor style when fixing it to the right side, bottom, and full-screen, thanks to @lishufood

- Improve display effect of .html2md-panel panel in simple mode

- Improve the style of configuration page in Settings panel

- Fix acmsguru title page editor error

- Fix issue with issue page code editor after switching between mobile/desktop version of website

- Fix a bug in getMarkdown() method that incorrectly stores data directly into DOM, resulting in a performance degradation

- Fixed translation buttons in collapsed blocks not showing up after turning off 'Collapsed block auto-expand', thanks to @MoYuToGo for the feedback

- Renamed the "Don't wait for page resources to fully load" option to uncheck it since it was theoretically meaningless

- Tweaked a lot of the code structure

- **A lot of the css class renaming, so you may need to tweak it if you use stylus custom styles**

- Some other tweaks and improvements



------



- Fixed ChatGPT config panel not displaying, thanks to @caoxuanming for the feedback

- Added a config switch "Mouse Scroll Lock" which is enabled by default, thanks to @liuhao6 for the Suggestions



------



- Update the API of clist rating to v4, adjust the data fetching method of title page to be fetched via API, thanks to @wrkwrk's suggestion

- Add ChatGPT translation "Streaming Transmission" option, on by default

- Fix the problem that Google translation result is empty. Thanks to @shicxin for his feedback

- Add a configuration switch "whether to confirm code submission twice", on by default Thanks to @Rikkual for his suggestion

- Add a button for small area in the full topic set page

- Fix the problem that the translation result is not shown when printing on the right click of the full topic set page Thanks to @zfs732 for his feedback



------



- Add a code editor at the bottom of the topic page to support online code testing, code submission and so on. code testing, code submission, etc. Please read the information page

- Fix the problem that inserting script button and translation result will be changed as topic description

- Improve the Chineseization of combo mashup management page

- Add the function of "auto-translate short text", disabled by default

- Improve the implementation of translation waiting interval, now the waiting interval is effective globally

- Improve the implementation of "show target area range"

- Improve the dark mode, improve the hover of sample elements. and improve hover style of sample elements, thanks to @SUPERLWR for feedback

- Add settings panel option: Translation - Filter \*\* in text, thanks to @Dog_E, CreMicro for feedback

- Fixed the issue that Clist Rating can't be displayed correctly after turning off the "Show Loading Alerts" option. Thanks to Vistarin for the feedback

- Some other improvements and fixes
